Detailed Description

A FontEntry encapsulates the data of one font. This data consists of the metadata for the font and the glyphdata.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

FontEntry::FontEntry (  const FontData *  data,
const GlyphData *  glyphs
) 
 

Constructor for FontEntry. Initializes the FontEntry object with the data given in parameter FontData and GlyphData.

Parameters:
data Pointer to the common data of the font like height, name,...

TextAttr  text_attr
)  const
 

Returns TRUE if the character given in parameter chr supports the style given in parameter text_attr.

Parameters:

text_attr Style the charakter should be displayable with.

BOOLEAN FontEntry::SupportsUnicodeRange (  WCHAR  from,
WCHAR  to
)  const
 

Returns true if the font object contains EACH character within the range given by the parameters from and to.

Parameters:
from Character to start reading from.
to Character where to stop reading.
Returns:
TRUE if each of the characters within the given range is contained in the string table, otherwise FALSE.
